ModMetaData.name: More Records - Interaction (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: 民火
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of 民火s mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2144051413
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/MoreRecordsInteraction][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Add records about interaction.
[h1]Additional Records[/h1] - Social fight (Time) - Lovin (Time) - Interact (Count)*1 - Interacted (Count)*1
*1 e.g.: chitchat, insult, romance attempt It also supports InteractionDef added by other mods.
[h1]Language[/h1] - English - Japanese - Polish (by Rademenes16) If you show me the link of translation file, I will add language file to mod.
[h1]Other versions[/h1] Old versions of the mod can be found on Dropbox. [url=https://www.dropbox.com/sh/xcpky6i20m70k0i/AACu_OVThRcgAM2MlrRUrXoua?dl=0]Dropbox[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
